long_description: Offering water-resistant protection for adverse weather, the Patagonia Nine Trails Knickers offer the comfort and fit you need to blaze your own trail when pursuing fitness goals. Lightweight recycled polyester and spandex fabric blend is used to create a durable and stretchy outer fabric. Fabric is soft and lightweight, and smooth to the touch; plus, it's treated with a durable water repellent finish to help get you though the drizzle. Covered elastic waistband with external drawcord; articulated knee construction; reflective logo on back hip. 2 open side pockets shelter hands; rear zippered pocket stores small items and features a key loop. Patagonia Nine Trails Knickers feature a slim fit and a 21 in. inseam.
short_description: Offering water-resistant protection for adverse weather, the Patagonia Nine Trails Knickers offer the comfort and fit you need to blaze your own trail when pursuing fitness goals.
